display_long_description:
# 🌀 Buy Squingle Mini for only $0.99 and save $2 on the full game when you upgrade!

Squingle Mini, offers an incredible bite-sized experience of the unique Mixed Reality 3D puzzle game, Squingle. 

Embark on a journey where the lines between the virtual and real worlds blur, offering endless fun and mind-bending challenges.

Guide the orbs from start to finish, avoid the edges, and collect points as you navigate through glass-like mazes called ‘Squingles.’🌠


# 🌈 A VISUAL MASTERPIECE
Each maze is a stunning, morphing, glass-like sculpture that comes to life in either Mixed Reality or a fully immersive environment, offering an unmatched visual experience in the puzzle genre.


# 🧩 ACCESSIBILITY
Designed to be accessible for a wide range of players and skill levels, with intuitive controls and hand-tracking support for seamless play, whether standing or seated.


# 😌 GLOBAL LEADERBOARD
Compete on the Squingle Mini Leaderboard! See the sum of your best times across all levels and compare them with others around the globe.

 
# 👻 RACE YOUR GHOST
Challenge your best times on each level to improve your leaderboard rank for endless fun!


# 🌀 Immerse yourself in the world of Squingle, where every twist presents a new challenge! 🌠
